reviews.review: very well done, they took SO many risks, and actually riveted the audience! They packed SO much into just one movie, I don't know how they did it
Great action . I just was so sleepy I w by at 11:00 I could not get the gist. I need to keep watching the series

Fantastic and kudos to the directors for managing to get some screen time with meaning for every character they included (was a bit bummed missing Hawkeye, Ant Man and the Wasp.  Also where was Aunt May?   Character development on Thanos could have been done a bit better but really was good enough.  Not happy with the ending but it had to be that.  Curious to see who ends up being permanently gone.  Cant wait for Ant Man and the Wasp, Captain Marvel and #4.
The best movie ever!!!!!!!!!  Movie of the year, so much action, romance, suspense, you just never know what's coming. Can't wait for the next one to come out!!!!
pretty ok, but bloated and not very rewatchable

As a marvel fan I had to give this 5 stars for its energy and ability to keep my eyes peeled and jaw dropped simultaneously. Maybe the story fell down in places but I feel like I was comparing it to Black Panther the while time as that was still so fresh in my mind but I came for a good time and it's exactly what I got. For those giving it a bad rep , looks its a super hero movie get over it . 
Still revelling in this even though my neck still aches because  I had to sit in the front row.
Second best marvel movie after winter soldier

I didn't enjoy this movie. It took me on a confusing long trip and when it finally delivered me to my destination I didn't know it. Nor did any of the audience in the theater which I sat. I guarantee that all testing done on this movie was totally ignored. Probably out of fear on producers part of delaying a huge project.
I have been waiting on this ending since the dark night rises huge shout out to Marvel!!!!!!
Sad ending, but everything else was good! Now we have to wait until 2020 for the next one. LOL
